description.value:
Trigger A creature the spirits knew in life enters the haunted area

Effect The spirits manifest with a terrible wailing. Each creature in the area must succeed at a @Check[will|dc:20] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2} on a critical failure). Frightened creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Immobilized] for as long as they remain frightened. The haunt then rolls initiative.

details.description: The spirits of community members linger on after their tragic deaths.
details.disable: @Check[diplomacy|dc:20] (untrained) to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Request] that the spirits leave or @Check[religion|dc:18] (trained) to exorcise the spirits
details.reset: The haunt falls silent for 24 hours once all frightened creatures die or reduce their frightened condition's value to 0. During this time, a creature that isn't frightened can exorcise the spirits with a @Check[religion|dc:18] check, permanently destroying the haunt.
details.routine:
(1 action; auditory, emotion, fear, mental) The haunt attempts an Intimidation check with a [[/gmr 1d20+11 #Intimidation]]{+11} modifier against the Will DC of each @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened] creature as it bombards them with the voices of their dead loved ones.

Critical Success The creature takes @Damage[2d4[mental]] damage and its frightened condition increases by 1, to a maximum of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 3}.

Success The creature takes @Damage[1d4[mental]] damage.

Failure The creature is unaffected.

Critical Failure The creature's frightened condition is reduced by 1.
